    • Method Detail

      • createAssignment

        @RequestMapping(value="/assignment/create",
                method=POST,
                consumes="multipart/form-data")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> createAssignment(java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestPart(value="properties")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              AssignmentDefinition props,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestPart(name="primarySrc",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile primarySrc,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestPart(name="secondarySrc",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile secondarySrc)
        Assignment creation/update route. If the AssignmentDefinition's ID is not null, it will attempt to update an existing assignment with the same ID.
        Parameters:
        principal - - (Automatic) (Requires Admin)
        props - - (form-data.properties)
        primarySrc - - (Optional) (form-data.primarySrc)
        secondarySrc - - (Optional) (form-data.secondarySrc)
        Returns:
        A JSON object with the assignmnet_id or an error message

      • getAllAssignments

        @RequestMapping(value="/assignment/get")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<AssignmentDefinition>> getAllAssignments()
        Assignment retrieval route. Since this route does not require admin privileges, the AssignmentDefinitions should not contain the secondary config
        Returns:
        A list of all registered AssignmentDefinitions

      • getAssignment

        @RequestMapping(value="/assignment/get/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AssignmentDefinition> getAssignment(java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                  java.util.UUID id)
        Individual assignment definition retrieval route. If the user is an admin, the secondary config info
        Parameters:
        principal - - (Automatic)
        id - - ID of the assignment to retrieve
        Returns:

      • deleteAssignment

        @RequestMapping(value="/assignment/delete/{id}",
                method=DELETE)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> deleteAssignment(java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                                                                                                                    @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                    java.util.UUID id)
        Assignment deletion route
        Parameters:
        principal - - (Automatic) (Requires Admin)
        id - - ID of the assignment to delete
        Returns:
        JSON object with error message if assignment could not be deleted successfully

      • submitAssignment

        @RequestMapping(value="/assignment/submit",
                method=POST,
                consumes="multipart/form-data")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> submitAssignment(java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestPart(value="properties")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              AssignmentSubmission submission,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestPart(name="src",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile src)
        Assignment submission route.
        Parameters:
        principal - - (Automatic)
        submission - - (form-data.properties) AssignmentSubmission properties. When submitting, the AssignmentSubmission's ID should be the ID of the assignment this submission is for
        src - - (form-data.src) Assignment src Zip
        Returns:
        a JSON object with an appropriate error message or a submission_id if submission is successful

      • getAssignmentSubmissions

        @RequestMapping(value="/assignment/artifacts/{id}")
public void getAssignmentSubmissions(java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                                                          @PathVariable
                                                                                          java.util.UUID id)
                                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Route retrieves a zip archive with all of the submission artifacts for a requested assignment
        Parameters:
        principal - - (Automatic) (Requires Admin)
        response - - (Automatic)
        id - - ID of the assignment to retrieve submission artifacts for
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
